name: Ready Camera 3 (zlaughingdragon)
description:
You play as a camera operator that is trying to keep focus on an important speech being given to a crowd. You have to switch cameras whenever something that could drop your ratings appears in-shot. Keep your ratings high, or it's game over!

This was a game jam from Global Game Jam.

Jam Site: 
IUPUI Informatics Building

Jam year: 
2018
